## Description

In session we will cover the following topics:

- What is Git and what are the basic concepts?
- A simple Git workflow for your individual projects
  - Tracking changes
  - Undoing changes
- Publishing projects on GitHub

In the [next session](02_git_collaboration.qmd), I will learn a collaborative workflow using Git and
GitHub.
